sourcesContent: import React from"react";import{Annotation as PenIcon}from"@scaleflex/icons/annotation";import ToolsBarItemButton from"../../ToolsBar/ToolsBarItemButton";import{TOOLS_IDS}from"../../../utils/constants";var PenButton=function(a){var b=a.selectTool,c=a.isSelected,d=a.t;return React.createElement(ToolsBarItemButton,{className:"FIE_pen-tool-button",id:TOOLS_IDS.PEN,label:d("penTool"),Icon:PenIcon,onClick:b,isSelected:c})};PenButton.defaultProps={isSelected:!1};export default PenButton;
